java/liquibase/database/sql/CopyRowsStatement.java

00001 package liquibase.database.sql;
00002 
00003 import java.util.List;
00004 
00005 import liquibase.change.ColumnConfig;
00006 import liquibase.database.Database;
00007 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;
00008 import liquibase.exception.StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException;
00009 
00010 public class CopyRowsStatement implements SqlStatement {
00011 
00012         private String sourceTable;
00013         private String targetTable;
00014         private List<ColumnConfig> copyColumns;
00015         
00016         
00017         public CopyRowsStatement(String sourceTable, String targetTable, 
00018                         List<ColumnConfig> copyColumns) {
00019                 this.sourceTable = sourceTable;
00020                 this.targetTable = targetTable;
00021                 this.copyColumns = copyColumns;
00022         }
00023         
00024         public String getSourceTable() {
00025                 return this.sourceTable;
00026         }
00027         
00028         public String getTargetTable() {
00029                 return this.targetTable;
00030         }
00031         
00032         public List<ColumnConfig> getCopyColumns() {
00033                 return this.copyColumns;
00034         }
00035 
00036         public String getEndDelimiter(Database database) {
00037                 return ";";
00038         }
00039 
00040         public String getSqlStatement(Database database)
00041                         throws StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException {
00042                 if (!supportsDatabase(database)) {
00043                         throw new StatementNotSupportedOnDatabaseException(this, database);
00044                 }
00045                 StringBuffer sql = new StringBuffer();
00046                 if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00047                         sql.append("INSERT INTO `"+getTargetTable()+"` SELECT ");
00048                         for (int i=0;i<getCopyColumns().size();i++) {
00049                                 ColumnConfig column = getCopyColumns().get(i);
00050                                 if (i>0) {
00051                                         sql.append(",");
00052                                 }
00053                                 sql.append("`"+column.getName()+"`");
00054                         }
00055                         sql.append(" FROM `"+getSourceTable()+"`");
00056                 }
00057                 return sql.toString();
00058         }
00059 
00060         public boolean supportsDatabase(Database database) {
00061                 return (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase);
00062         }
00063 
00064 }
